newsArray.title: Ghanaian young star Joseph Narbi joins Roc Nation Sports International
newsArray.description: Promising Ghanaian winger Joseph Narbi has made a significant leap in his football journey by signing with Roc Nation Sports International (RNSI), a globally renowned and fast-growing sports agency.The talented teen, currently with Benab FC in Ghana, is among a select group of standout African prospects chosen as part of RNSIâs strategic push into the African football scene.Narbi's selection as one of the first signees in this initiative is a clear testament to his high potential.Renowned for his explosive speed, flair, and dribbling skills, he has caught the attention of scouts through his outstanding performances in the Ghana Division Two and also with the Ghana U17 national team, solidifying his status as one of the nationâs top young talents.RNSIâs foray into Africa represents a pivotal moment for the agency, which is focused not only on discovering elite footballers but also on offering comprehensive career development and international exposure.With access to RNSIâs broad global network and its player-first ethos, Narbi is now well-positioned to elevate his career to new heights.This move also emphasises Ghanaâs growing role as a powerhouse for football talent in Africa and underlines Roc Nationâs deepening commitment to nurturing youth development across...

newsArray.title: 1억파운드 '천재 킬러', 어떡하다 이리 됐나...'HERE WE GO'→'BBC' 확인, 퍼거슨 또또 임대. 이번에는 로마行
creator: 스포츠조선
newsArray.description: [스포츠조선 김성원 기자]10대 때 잉글랜드 프리미어리그(EPL)를 집어삼킬 기세였다. 그의 가치는 1억파운드(약 1870억원)로 평가됐다. 맨유, 첼시, 토트넘 등 빅클럽의 러브콜이 쇄도했다. 하지만 현재는 '떠돌이 신세'로 전락했다. 브라이턴의 에반 퍼거슨(21)이 또 임대를 떠난다. 이번에는 이탈리아 세리에A다. 영국의 'BBC'는 21일(한국시각)
